humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is one sentinel lymph node positive for metastatic carcinoma out of one assessed (1/1) in the right axilla, and one additional positive lymph node out of seventeen assessed (1/17) in the right axillary dissection. This information corresponds to N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system, as per New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma present in 1 out of 17 examined lymph nodes (1/17), with a focus of metastatic carcinoma measuring 1.3 cm and extracapsular extension identified. This corresponds to a pathologic N1a stage.
